vest.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a piece of underwear without sleeves that you wear on the top half of your body
vest.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a piece of special clothing without sleeves that you wear over your clothes to protect your body
vest.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a piece of clothing without sleeves and with buttons down the front that you wear as part of a suit
vest.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: if shares, stocks etc are vested, they are owned by someone
vest.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: About one-third of these options are vested and can be exercised by shareholders at any time.
